items.title: Walmart is selling a 'very solid' and 'comfortable' patio glider swing for only $106
items.description: One shopper said that it "looks like it will last for years."

items.description: "We use it in our home, cars and camper!"

items.description: A versatile couch for anyone with limited space.

items.title: Walmart is selling a 'very nice,' all-steel platform bed frame for $97

items.title: Disney sends stern warning to customers amid boycott threats
items.description: Disney has made an unexpected announcement that may further frustrate customers.
